DataElement.preferredName: ECOG - Performance Status Assessment Date Subtract Biospecimen Collection Date Duration Day Calculation Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of days from the date surgery was performed to acquire the sample to the date that the Eastern Cooperative Oncology status assessment was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: ECOG - Performance Status Assessment Date Subtraction Biospecimen Collection Date Duration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance status._The date (and time) on which an assessment is completed._The act of removing a part from the whole._The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen._The period of time during which something continues.

ObjectClass.preferredName: ECOG - Performance Status Assessment Date Subtraction Biospecimen Collection Date
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance status.:The date (and time) on which an assessment is completed.:The act of removing a part from the whole.:The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

Concepts.definition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance status.
The date (and time) on which an assessment is completed.
The act of removing a part from the whole.
The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

Property.preferredDefinition: The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: The period of time during which something continues.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated to support HCMI Brain Tumor_10.10.17_ghd

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours._The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Calculation created for TCGA content requested by Dr. Ari Kahn.  This VD uses a calculation of dividing a value by the number of milliseconds in a day (86,400,000) to result in a number of days, stored as a whole number.
